summary: AI - The illusive and brilliant Satoshi Nakamoto’s identity remains a mystery leaving a multi of unans questions. What does he really look like? What’s his real name? What are his ibterest outside of bitcoin? Does he have any pets? Hmm…if Satoshi Nakamoto had a dog…what would his name be? We asked the all knowing Grok Ai for assistance. The result… satoshi’s Dog’s name is… BitBuddy!
